outfit.description: The person is wearing a bright royal blue long-sleeved crew-neck sweatshirt or hoodie. They are also wearing light grey or light-wash denim pants. They have long, dark, straight hair, parted on the side, that falls over their shoulders. They are wearing dark-rimmed glasses and a watch on their left wrist.

activity.description: The person is sitting at a wooden table and actively working on a silver laptop. They are typing on the keyboard and looking at the screen.

background.description: The setting is an indoor environment, likely a library, cafe, or shared workspace. The person is seated at a rectangular wooden table. On the table, there is the laptop, a light-colored cup or bottle, and another water bottle. In the background, there are vertical wooden slat panels, possibly a wall or partition. The floor appears to be light-colored tile or concrete. There are reflections from what appears to be a window or strong light source, creating some glare.
background.environment: wooden table, wooden slat panels, light-colored floor, other tables/chairs (partially visible)
background.lighting: well-lit, with some natural light or strong artificial light creating glare

summary: A person with long dark hair and glasses, dressed in a royal blue sweatshirt and light pants, is seen sitting at a wooden table in an indoor setting, actively typing and working on a silver laptop.
